      • OrionBroker

        public OrionBroker(java.lang.String host,
                   java.lang.String port,
                   java.lang.String fiware_service,
                   java.lang.String fiware_service_path)
        Parameters:
        host - The hostname or IP where the Context Broker is running.
        port - The service port.
        fiware_service - The string that identifies a FIWARE service, for instance, 'lw_cos'.
        fiware_service_path - The string that identifies a FIWARE service path, for instance '/'.
